body.p: The process of editing a text begins with entering the transliteration. After you have chosen a BTS Object you would like to edit, just click in the Text Editor Transliteration field. However, in order to enter a transliteration, you first need to install and configure the keyboard provided by the BBAW. Other steps in the text editing process involve lemmatizing of your transliterated text, assigning inflection codes to the lemma, entering translation and hieroglyphs to the text. You can also add comments, rubra, etc. to the transliteration whenever you wish. The following order of editing is not compulsory. It is only supposed to help you with particular functions of the BTS. It is up to you to decide the order of the text editing.
